name: Semi-Sweet Chocolate Chunk
description: Chocolate chip, but make it chunky—a delicious cookie filled with irresistible semi-sweet chocolate chunks and a sprinkle of flaky sea salt.

name: Mallow Sandwich ft. Oreo
description: A fluffy, creamy center with brownie pieces sandwiched between two chocolate cookies made with OREO® cookie pieces. OREO is a trademark of Mondelēz International group, used with permission.

name: Salted Caramel Cheesecake
description: A caramel cheesecake baked over a buttery graham cracker crust, then topped with a drizzle of caramel, a sprinkle of sea salt, and a dollop of whipped cream.

name: Galaxy Brownie
description: A brownie cookie smothered in a warm fudge glaze and sprinkled with rainbow candy bits.

name: Skillet Cookie
description: A warm and gooey semi-sweet chocolate chip cookie, topped with a generous scoop of vanilla bean mousse and a rich drizzle of semi-sweet chocolate.

name: Confetti Cake Cookies
description: These Crumbl Confetti Cake Cookies are a soft and delicious sprinkle filled sugar cookie topped with a fluffy pink vanilla cream cheese frosting and extra sprinkles on top.

name: Triple Berry Cobbler
description: House-made berry jam nestled in layers of cinnamon streusel and topped with a creamy vanilla bean mousse.

name: Served Chilled Strawberry Milk ft. Pirouline®
description: A chilled strawberry streusel cookie brimming with milky strawberry mousse, topped with a dollop of whipped cream and a crunchy Pirouline® wafer straw.

name: Peanut Butter ft. REESE'S PIECES
description: A thick peanut butter cookie packed with irresistible REESE’S PIECES candies. REESE’S PIECES trademark and trade dress are used under license.

name: Rob's Backstage Caramel Popcorn Cookie
description: A buttery cookie topped with sweet caramel cream cheese frosting, crunchy caramel popcorn pieces, and a light drizzle of melted caramel.

name: Tres Leches Cake
description: A lightly spiced cake soaked in a classic tres leches sauce, topped with Lotus Biscoff® cookie butter, fresh whipped cream, Lotus Biscoff® cookie pieces, and a drizzle of melted Lotus Biscoff® cookie butter.

name: Brookie
description: A semi-sweet chocolate chip cookie and a rich chocolate cookie perfectly baked together.

name: Sugar ft. Mother’s® Circus Animal
description: A rainbow sprinkles cookie smothered with melty white drops then crowned with a Mother’s® Original Circus Animal® Cookie and a splash of rainbow sprinkles.
